question_text: Why might a USB headset be chosen over a TRRS analog headset in a modern computing environment?
answer_options: USB headsets only require one driver for video and audio
USB headsets can provide digital audio processing and mic support via one port
TRRS connectors are no longer supported by mobile devices
correct_answer: USB headsets can provide digital audio processing and mic support via one port
explanation: USB headsets include integrated DACs and often offer enhanced digital audio quality and mic support in one plug.
